get.summary: Find a related item by id for devices.

delete.summary: Delete a related item by id for devices.

put.summary: Update a related item by id for devices.

post.summary: Creates a new instance in devices of this model.

delete.summary: Deletes all devices of this model.

get.summary: Find a model instance by {{id}} from the data source.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter defining fields and include - must be a JSON-encoded string ({"something":"value"})

delete.summary: Delete a model instance by {{id}} from the data source.

get.summary: Find all instances of the model matched by filter from the data source.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter defining fields, where, include, order, offset, and limit - must be a JSON-encoded string (`{"where":{"something":"value"}}`).  See https://loopback.io/doc/en/lb3/Querying-data.html#using-stringified-json-in-rest-queries for more details.

post.summary: Register a user account with email and password.

get.summary: Count instances of the model matched by where from the data source.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: appId is one of: android, ios, web, other

post.summary: Reset password for a user with email.
Login a user with email and password.
Logout a user with access token.

get.summary: Confirm a user registration with identity verification token.

post.summary: Reset user's password via a password-reset token.
